coursera.name: Coursera
coursera.description: I joined the Coursera Mobile team and worked on a bunch of cool projects, from building support for Peer review assesments to building a new main page and accomplishments page

enflick.name: Enflick
enflick.description: At Enflick I worked as part of the android team on the Textnow app. It was an incredible experience, I learned a ton, and got to design and code super cool things

tech-retreat.name: TechRetreat
tech-retreat.description: I was one of the organizers of TechRetreat as well as a teacher for our Learnathon. In less than ten hours kids with no prior coding experience were writing working Ruby AIs for TechTanks

army-commander.name: Army Commander
army-commander.description: Create and control an army using custom or preset gestures for different formations and actions. Enemies work together and form groups to defend themselves

techtanks.name: TechTanks
techtanks.description: Write a ruby AI to control a tank, then test against your friends programs, all in your browser with no setup. Made for TechRetreat Learnathon

3d-viewer.name: 3D Viewer
3d-viewer.description: Takes sets of connected 3D points and draws them onto a canvas. Walk and jump using screen controls and look around by rotating phone. Coded from scratch using only Android Canvas

swipler.name: Swipler
swipler.description: Chrome extention that use the doppler effect to detect hand gestures using your laptops mic and speakers. Switches/removes tabs when you swipe different directions

intoxicmate.name: IntoxicMate
intoxicmate.description: Uses your location, time, heart-rate etc over time to guess when you are intoxicated. IntoxicMate will then help guide you home, call a cab, or in emergencies call friends/family

myoguitar.name: MyoGuitar
myoguitar.description: Use the Myo to play a virtual guitar on your android device. Detects strums when you have your hand closed and uses your fingers positions to play chords on the phone

war-of-myths.name: War of Myths
war-of-myths.description: Play as a mage and explore the world. Enemies path and search around obstacles, dodge harm, and guess your movement. Started in grade 6 as a flash game, written for android in grade 11

engsoc.name: EngSoc
engsoc.description: At Uwaterloo I help out the Engineering Society as an Ambassador, Director, Orientation Leader, and First Year Mentor, as well as helping with specific events

sipo.name: SIPOFoundation
sipo.description: In Toronto I got to be part of an organization aiming to Inspire and Equip young professionals. I webmastered and helped with SIPOConference and SIPOWorkshops

osc.name: Ontario Science Centre
osc.description: After spending second semester grade 12 studying at the OSC, I also got a chance to work there as a Host, interacting with visitors and helping with shows

find-me.name: Find Me
find-me.description: Create and share item lists with your friends through their email. People on a list can move and search for items, display list contents, and add or delete items

flash-games.name: Flash Games
flash-games.description:
A collection of old as2 and as3 flash games made around grade 5 to 8

Follow the link to read descriptions, and play

ring-manager.name: Ring Manager
ring-manager.description: Create sets of ring/vibration settings for different times/days, for example Work: 9-5 Mon-Fri. The current active set decides notification actions for certain contacts or groups
